timeline.message:
Simplify finalizing native reports

Collapse finalizing previous native report into existing session
finalize operation.

timeline.bodyText: can you add some justification for why this is an else if? why do we only do native stuff if includeCurrent = false? Why do we not do it if includeCurrent = false?
timeline.author: jakeouellette

replies.bodyText: Yeah, this is one of those "the code needs more cleaning" issues. includeCurrent implies this is being run at Java crash time. We only want to run this code for the startup-time initialize.
replies.author: mrwillis21

timeline.bodyText: before we were returning a boolean and logging based on it, do we need to do an equivalent?
timeline.author: jakeouellette
